mapper.insert: insert into employee(characteristic, email, curator, pin_number, name_department, id_picture_major, id_picture_minor, name, phone, post, qualification_detailed, qualification_briefly) values (#{characteristic}, #{email}, #{curator}, #{pinNumber}, #{nameDepartment}, #{idPictureMajor} , #{idPictureMinor}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{post}, #{qualificationDetailed}, #{qualificationBriefly});
mapper.update: UPDATE employee SET name_department = #{nameDepartment}, id_picture_major = #{idPictureMajor}, name = #{name}, post = #{post}, phone = #{phone}, email = #{email}, curator = #{curator}, qualification_detailed = #{qualificationDetailed}, qualification_briefly = #{qualificationBriefly}, characteristic = #{characteristic} WHERE id = #{id};
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM employee WHERE name_department = #{nameDepartment} order by pin_number;
